name: Dr. Najia Alami
description: Dr. Najia Alami is a leading marine biologist and oceanographer from Morocco. She is renowned for her research on the physical and biological dynamics of Moroccan coastal waters. Her work has had a significant impact on the management of Morocco's marine ecosystems, with a particular focus on understanding the impacts of human activities, such as fishing and coastal development, on marine life. Dr. Alami has also been an advocate for marine conservation and the importance of sustainable development in coastal regions. Her expertise and contributions have been pivotal in the development of marine research initiatives in Morocco.
